title: Software Engineer 1 | NCR Corporation | Hyderabad
content:
Education: B.Tech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 0
Company: NCR
Title/Level : Software Engineer 1
Location: Hyderabad, India
Salary: Rs. 12,00,000 
Relocation: 14 days accomodation was provided
Joining Bonus: 2,00,000
Stock bonus: None
Total comp (Salary + Bonus ):  Rs. 14,00,000 
Benefits: 21 paid vacation days + 12 paid sick leave days + Standard NCR Benefits

title: 3 Months Old Startup | SDE1 | Delhi
content:
* **Education**: B.Tech, CSE, TIER 2 College
* **Years of Experience**: 1.5
* **Prior Company:** Remote Product based Company
* **Prior Compensation:** 2280000(base 20 lpa + annual bonus 2 lacs + 80000 LTI)
* **Company:** Early Age Startup related to AdTech(3 Months old)
* **Offer Date:** 10/Jan/2024
* **Title/Level:** SDE1
* **Location:** Delhi
* **Base pay:** INR 2270000 (PF + Gratuity included)
* **Joining Bonus:** INR 1 lacs
* **Annual Bonus per year:** INR 330000 
* **ESOPS:** INR 10 Lacs(Vested Over 4 Years)
* **Total comp (Salary + Bonus + ESOPS):** ~ INR 29.5 LPA
* **Benefits:** ESOPS were given at par value for founding engineers

**Decision: Rejected the offer as base salary was below expectations.**
